mapper.select: select * FROM ( SELECT a.board_id, a.ctnt, a.cdate, a.file_code, a.scope, a.b_division, a.user_id, b.name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM boardlike WHERE board_id = a.board_id) as likeQty FROM board a JOIN "USER" b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.b_division = 'BD' AND a.scope = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY TO_DATE(LEFT(a.board_id, 8), 'YYYYMMDD') DESC, CAST(RIGHT(a.board_id, 5) AS INTEGER) DESC OFFSET #{page} ROWS LIMIT 10 ) F left outer join "comment" g on f.board_id = g.board_id ORDER BY TO_DATE(LEFT(f.board_id, 8), 'YYYYMMDD') DESC, CAST(RIGHT(f.board_id, 5) AS INTEGER) DESC

SELECT e.*, COUNT(r.board_id) AS rec_count FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY board_id DESC) AS rNum, board_id, ctnt, file_code, b_division, inqire_qty, rec_qty, mntn_nm, board_title, participation_pee, deadline_status, cdate FROM ( SELECT a.board_id, a.ctnt, a.file_code, a.b_division, b.inqire_qty, b.rec_qty, b.mntn_nm, b.board_title, b.participation_pee, b.deadline_status, a.cdate FROM board a INNER JOIN r_board b ON a.board_id = b.board_id ) AS subquery ) AS d ORDER BY d.board_id DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex} ) AS e LEFT OUTER JOIN recruitment r ON e.board_id = r.board_id GROUP BY e.board_id,e.rNum, e.ctnt, e.file_code, e.b_division, e.inqire_qty, e.rec_qty, e.mntn_nm, e.board_title, e.participation_pee, e.deadline_status, e.cdate order by e.rnum

mapper.select: SELECT a.board_id "boardId", a.file_code "fileCode", a.user_id "userId", a.cdate "cdate", a.ctnt "ctnt", b.mntn_nm "mntnNm", b.participation_pee "participationPee", b.board_title "boardTitle", b.rec_qty "recQty", COUNT(r.*) AS "recCount" FROM board a INNER JOIN r_board b ON a.board_id = b.board_id LEFT OUTER JOIN recruitment r ON b.board_id = r.board_id WHERE a.board_id = #{boardId} GROUP BY a.board_id, a.file_code, a.user_id, a.cdate, a.ctnt, b.mntn_nm, b.participation_pee, b.board_title, b.rec_qty
